dict.acceptation: 古怪的；奇数的；剩余的；临时的；
奇特的事物；怪人；[高尔夫球]多于对方的一次击球；

sent.orig: A new combinatorial dispatching rule, RAN(FCFS,ODD), and a heuristic method are designed.
sent.trans: 设计了一种组合式调度规则RAN(FCFS,ODD),并提出了基于规则的启发式算法以及该类动态Job shop调度问题的算例生成方法。

sent.orig: We arrange its elements in ascending order, they are odd, even, odd, even, odd.
sent.trans: 我们按其上升的顺序排列为奇、偶、奇、偶、奇。

sent.orig: Odd even analysis: Over the past 10 odd-even for the trend: The odd-evenparity.
sent.trans: 奇偶分析：近10期奇偶走势为：奇偶偶偶偶偶偶奇偶偶。

sent.orig: Abstract: An odd number plus another odd number equals an even number.
sent.trans: 文摘：双奇数相加等于一个偶数。

sent.orig: Odd-numbered buildings or buildings with odd numbers are on the south side of the street.
